page.title: 04BENTCLIFF HILL LANE - cont.
page.content: In recent years,persons with a dog,walking at twilight in the Toll Bar and Bentcliff Hill areas have had disturbing experiences caused by some supernatural presence resulting in the dog being terror-stricken. All round Cawthorne in the last century or more recently there have been numerous pits dug as part of the search for coal. This means the area is riddled with airshafts.To the North of Hill House Farm to the road,there is a grassy hill with cattle grazing on it.Only about 17 years ago it was dug out to a depth of 9O feet.
